attributes.action: make a one house per person limit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is absurd that anyone (and especially the poorest) should be expected to pay someone else's mortgage, and on top of that to pay them for the privilege of doing so. The benefits of making land lording illegal would be: 1)Reduce House prices 2)Less homelessness 3)Helps economic equality 4)Less debt to banks
